Name: Red Risk
About the game: Volunteers fight in a bloody contest for freedom and money. Play as one of three volunteers armed with their favorite weapons, survive waves of enemies and bosses. Red Risk will put you into a bloody tournament, will you survive? 3 players co-op; Eat, drink and fill your ammo in order to survive; Elite monsters with unique set of skills to hunt you down.
